subsection.name: Check out demo application
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run the demo application like the following:

div.source: $ svn co https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/hst-shirointeg/hst-shirointeg-demo/trunk hst-shirointeg-demo $ cd hst-shirointeg-demo $ mvn clean package $ mvn -P cargo.run

ul.li: If you visit http://localhost:8080/site/, then by default, you can navigate all the pages except of /events/** pages. Please refer to the configuration in /WEB-INF/shiro.ini for the access configuration.
You can sign in by author/author, editor/editor or admin/admin. And, you will be able to see different roles and permissions assigned to you in the Hippo Repository security data store.
Please see Repository Authorization and Permissions for details on how to configure Authorization in Hippo Repository.
